data: Apple Inc. is a multinational technology company that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, software, and online services.
Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and related services.
Alphabet Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.
Amazon.com Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.
Organisational restructuring and cost-cutting measures were implemented by the company in 2015.
The company's performance in 2015 was impacted by a decline in sales of its flagship product.
